name: Majority Ruling
description:
PLEASE PLAY IN FULLSCREEN

Majority Ruling is a political simulator to try and win majority of votes every election!

You start out small as the class chairman, but overtime, you set yourself up for the bigger
stages like the School President and even the President!

Resources are calculated at the end of every day and if you do not have enough resources to 
perform the action on the day itself, you waste the timeslot! Resources can also not go below
0 or above 100!

Also you'll need to track the liked and disliked messages of each district manually for
added difficulty! Welcome to the real world.

Best of Luck Future President!

=====================================================

Link to GitHub: https://github.com/knotstoks/iwonbyalot

Game Build: https://knotstoks.itch.io/majority-ruling

Controls: Mouse to click

Team Name: friendfriendfriend Made by: Chan Ger Hean Steven Chua Loo Xin Wei Kenneth Hong

Credits for Backgrounds: https://lemmasoft.renai.us/forums/viewtopic.php?t=17302
